title: Pressure dependence of vortex tunneling in He II.
abstract: Measurements of the rate nu at which negative ions nucleate charged vortex rings in isotopically pure superfluid He-4 for electric fields E, temperatures T and pressures P within the ranges 10^3 < E < 10^6 V/m, 75 < T < 500 mK, 12 < P < 23 bar show that the energy barrier impeding the tunneling process is strongly dependent on pressure. Minima observed in nu(T) are ascribed to phonon damping

        Measurements of the rate nu at which negative ions nucleate charged vortex rings in isotopically pure superfluid He-4 for electric fields E, temperatures T and pressures P within the ranges 10^3 < E < 10^6 V/m, 75 < T < 500 mK, 12 < P < 23 bar show that the energy barrier impeding the tunneling process is strongly dependent on pressure.
